definition: scissors/shears/clippers/CL:把[ba3]/to cut with scissors/to trim/to wipe out or exterminate
knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs
prices scissor (caught between low income and high prices)

sentences.english: Cut out the leaf rubbings with scissors.
sentences.chinese: 用剪刀将叶子拓片剪下。

sentences.english: I want a pair of scissors and a bottle of whiteout.
sentences.chinese: 我想要一支剪刀和一瓶涂改液。

sentences.english: Every time I watched this movie, my tears welled up in my eyes.
sentences.chinese: 在看《剪刀手爱德华》时，泪水模糊了我的视线。

sentences.english: Don't play with scissors or pen knives.
Abruzzi smiles as one of his goons holds gardening shears.
sentences.chinese: Abruzzi微笑着，他的一个打手拿着剪刀。

sentences.english: A new explanation is offered for this diverging "scissors gap" in this article.
sentences.chinese: 作者对这种发散的“剪刀差”态势作了新的解释。

sentences.english: Cut out the fabric-covered owls and wings with scissors.
sentences.chinese: 用剪刀把已经缝上布的猫头鹰剪下来。

sentences.english: Continue to cut the hair upwards cutting at an angle when fade lines are reached.
sentences.chinese: 每到达一条发际线的时候继续用斜方剪刀修剪头发。

sentences.english: Each book carving was made using sharp knives , tweezers, and scissors .
sentences.chinese: 每一本书雕都是借助锋利的刀片，镊子和剪刀完成的。

sentences.english: They were unbelievably sharp and could be taken apart so they could be washed or the blades sharpened.
sentences.chinese: 剪刀很锋利，两边可以拆开来清洗或是磨刀口。

sentences.english: Why did you tear the cloth instead of cutting it with scissors?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么用手撕布而不用剪刀剪？

sentences.english: Can I still use Rock Scissors Paper as the title?
sentences.chinese: 我说，“我还能用石头剪刀布作为书名吗？”

sentences.english: Begin cutting the hair upwards from the bottom of the hairline with the hair clippers.
sentences.chinese: 用剪刀从发际线下端向上剪。
咱们玩石头剪刀布蜥蜴史伯克吧。

sentences.english: Knife in hand, she commands the servants to bring her an old sheep.
sentences.chinese: 她手持剪刀，命令仆人为她取一只老羊。

definition: scissors/shears/clippers/CL:把[ba3]/to cut with scissors/to trim/to wipe out or exterminate
